programme.title: Unsupersize Us
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Unsupersize Us follows director Juan-Carlos Asse takes five people from his hometown that suffer from common health issues and puts them on a regimen of a plant based diet and exercise, changing their lives forever.

programme.title: Life Stories with Marc Hoberman
programme.sub-title: LSWMH - Stan Zimmerman
programme.desc: Writer Stan Zimmerman (Golden Girls, Gilmore Girls, Roseanne, A Very Brady Sequel and more) talks about his incredible Hollywood journey. Stan also discusses the dangers of bullying.

programme.title: Life Stories with Marc Hoberman
programme.sub-title: LSWMH - Damon WIlliams
programme.desc: Comedian Damon Williams talks about his road to success. Damon also talks about the perseverance needed to succeed in comedy and life in general.

programme.title: Life Stories with Marc Hoberman
programme.sub-title: LSWMH - Sheyna Gee
programme.desc: Country Artist Sheyna Gee is featured in today's episode. Sheyna will talk about writing and performing both nationally and internationally.

programme.title: Life Stories with Marc Hoberman
programme.sub-title: LSWMH - Jack Maxwell
programme.desc: Jack Maxwell talks about acting, his experiences on The Booze Traveler, and Overcoming Adversity.

programme.title: World’s Greatest Motivators
programme.sub-title: World’s Greatest Motivators David Meltzer
programme.desc: Starring DAVID MELTZER, and with special cameo appearance by boxing champion, Sugar Ray Leonard.

programme.title: World’s Greatest Motivators
programme.sub-title: World's Greatest Motivators - Mary Morrissey
programme.desc: Mary Morrissey, with cameo appearances by Les Brown, David Meltzer, Bob Proctor and special guest, celebrity boxer and motivator, Sugar Ray Leonard

programme.title: Play To Win
programme.sub-title: Play To Win- Episode 3
programme.desc: This episode is all about HOW to demonstrate your worth and we've never seen so many people pour themselves out and completely rebuild like we saw in this episode.

programme.title: World’s Greatest Motivators
programme.sub-title: World’s Greatest Motivators David Meltzer
programme.desc: Starring DAVID MELTZER, and with special cameo appearance by boxing champion, Sugar Ray Leonard.

programme.title: World’s Greatest Motivators
programme.sub-title: World's Greatest Motivators - Mary Morrissey
programme.desc: Mary Morrissey, with cameo appearances by Les Brown, David Meltzer, Bob Proctor and special guest, celebrity boxer and motivator, Sugar Ray Leonard

programme.title: Sex Talk
programme.sub-title: Sex Talk - Choosing the Right Sex Toy
programme.desc: Wondering how to choose the sex toy that is right for you? Plus, we'll explore the healthy habits of couples who are having great sex. All this and more on Sex Talk with Dr. Lia.

programme.title: Sex Talk
programme.sub-title: Sex Talk - Why Young People are Having Less Sex
programme.desc: Why young Americans are having less sex than ever before. Plus, how having a good time in the bedroom can help you in the boardroom.

programme.title: Sex Talk
programme.sub-title: Sex Talk - What Do Sexy Dreams Really Mean?
programme.desc: Remember that sexy dream you had? We dish about what it means. Plus, picking the right condom for him and her. All this and more on Sex Talk with Dr. Lia.

programme.title: The Rising Man Podcast
programme.sub-title: Explore Your Pain Consciously with Jeff Agostinelli & Jeddy Azuma
programme.desc: As an ultra-marathoner, men’s coach and father, Jeff Agostinelli has leveraged pain for EXPLORATION. We also cover how to handle substance abuse, why addictive tendencies can be used positively, and how to separate ourselves from emotion.

programme.title: The Rising Man Podcast
programme.sub-title: Sexual Insecurities: Expression Leads To Liberation with Taylor Johnson & Jeddy Azuma
programme.desc: Men’s sex coach Taylor Johnson knows the top blockages to masculine sexual liberation and offers examples of how to HEAL. We also explore how to achieve sexual mastery and why lasting a long time doesn’t usually lead to good sex.

programme.title: The Rising Man Podcast
programme.sub-title: How Passive Permission Asking Sabotages Epic Sex with Sarrah Rose & Jeddy Azuma
programme.desc: Sarrah Rose is a men’s coach specialized in tantric activation, sexual healing, and relational mastery. She leads men to re-discover their primal and sacred generative powers, and shares some of her juiciest findings with us.

programme.title: The Mindsetters
programme.sub-title: Guest Jeremy Lewis
programme.desc: Realtor and Social Media Influencer Jeremy Lewis discusses how he used social media to make his come back in Real Estate after losing everthing

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.sub-title: Medical Gaslighting: How to Avoid It
programme.desc: We speak with experts about how to protect yourself from medical gaslighting, and other things you should know before you visit a doctor or dentist.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.sub-title: The Truth About Vitamins
programme.desc: Nutrition expert Dr. Thunder Jalili joins us to discuss why Americans spend more than $30 billion a year on dietary supplements, despite decades of research disputing their ability to improve health outcomes.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.sub-title: Diabetes: The Path to a Cure
programme.desc: Dr. Robert Gabbay, chief scientific and medical officer of the American Diabetes Association, speaks with us about new preventative drugs and devices for diabetes patients, and how much progress has been made in the path towards a cure.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.sub-title: Inside the Latest Health Technology
programme.desc: In our medical technology episode, we explore how patients can use mobile apps to monitor and treat chronic conditions, discuss the positive and negative effects of video games on children, and look at how robotic pets are being used to assist people with dementia.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.sub-title: What You Need to Know about the 988 Hotline
programme.desc: In this episode, we are joined by members of the National Action Alliance for Suicide Prevention to talk about the 988 suicide and crisis lifeline, discussing how the lifeline works and what more needs to be done to ensure equitable support for everyone.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.sub-title: Fighting Heart Disease
programme.desc: The president of the American College of Cardiology joins us to discuss how heart disease is the leading cause of death in American women, and how different factors and treatments can lower or worsen your risk of cardiovascular disease.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.sub-title: Why Are Allergies Getting Worse Every Year?
programme.desc: Medical experts meet to discuss seasonal allergies and why each spring brings more intense allergy symptoms than the last.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.sub-title: What's Next for the CDC?
programme.desc: We’re joined by the former chief of staff at the CDC to discuss what the agency learned during the COVID-19 pandemic and how it plans to move forward. We’ll also take a look at the long-term effects of COVID and how you can boost your vaccine’s effectiveness even further.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.sub-title: Maternity Risks
programme.desc: We’re joined by the president and CEO of March of Dimes to discuss the risks that pregnant women — particularly women of color — still face in the United States.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.sub-title: The Future of Mental Health Treatment
programme.desc: In this episode, we take a look at the mental health benefits of healthy eating and exercising and explore the future of depression treatment, while debunking popular myths about causes and cures for depression.

programme.title: OmStars- Yoga Is Series
programme.sub-title: Yoga Is - Day 10 Happiness Baddha Konasana
programme.desc: You can be happy for no reason at all… Happiness can be our natural state. Start day 10 with attention at the heart center and the recollection of an uplifting memory. Holding on to that feeling, move into practice with a warm up rooted in backbending and sun salutations. Next, follow Kino through through a hip opening sequence. As we approach today’s pinnacle pose, Baddha Konasana, remember that there is no need for the body to be in any particular place. Practice acceptance and happiness here and now.

programme.title: OmStars- Yoga Is Series
programme.sub-title: Yoga Is - Day 11 Compassion Shalabhasana
programme.desc: Day 11 of the challenge is centered around a quality that is perhaps the very essence of being a yogi: Compassion

programme.title: OmStars- Yoga Is Series
programme.sub-title: Yoga Is - Day 12 Gratitude Parsvakonasana A
programme.desc: Today is day 12 of our challenge and the lesson is built around the standing posture Parsvakonasana A.

programme.title: Good Morning Joy
programme.sub-title: Good Morning Joy - Speaking with the Heart
programme.desc: Dr. Heather Browne is a master at transforming conversations between couples. She shares how she helps couples bridge divides and cultivate more fulfilling relationships. Plus, we are back in India chatting with some cute kids and sharing good news.

programme.title: Good Morning Joy
programme.sub-title: Good Morning Joy - Unleash Your Inner Warrior
programme.desc: Hollywood star, Sean Kanan, helps you unleash your inner warrior and change your life with his new book. We head to Rochester, NY, for a party that has been 46 years in the making. And we go international with inspiring conversations from India and Italy!

programme.title: The Aware Show
programme.sub-title: The Aware Show - Finding Harmony When Overwhelmed
programme.desc: Feeling overwhelmed? Host Lisa Garr talks with author and women’s empowerment expert Christine Arylo. Finding balance may be challenging, but we can always strive for harmony and flow. Arylo discusses setting boundaries and allowing ourselves space to breathe by finding ways in which we can receive support. Info: christinearylo.com.

programme.title: The Aware Show
programme.sub-title: The Aware Show - Power of Intentions
programme.desc: Today Lisa Garr discusses the power of intentions with best-selling author and international speaker Lynne McTaggart. An expert in consciousness, and editor of the magazine “What Doctors Don’t Tell You,” Lynne suggests going for “small wins” which all add up to greater success and flourishing health. Info: lynnemctaggart.com.

programme.title: The Aware Show
programme.sub-title: The Aware Show - United We Rise
programme.desc: Join Lisa Garr and her panel of guests, musician Chris Pierce, technology expert Moses Ma, and internationally noted biochemist Fred Brown. Today they talk about the science behind vaccines as well as “United We Rise,” a new collaborative song which honors the more than 300,000 lives lost during the pandemic.

programme.title: The Rico No Suave Talk Show
programme.sub-title: The Rico No Suave Talk Show - Harold Dennis
programme.desc: The Hyped Actor Harold Dennis, Get to learn more about Dennis that has trained for years under some great teachers and will be giving you insight on how that have helped him become a professional.

programme.title: Pull Up The Curtain with G Souldier
programme.sub-title: Pull Up The Curtain - Haywood Nelson
programme.desc: An In-Depth interview with Hollywood Actor Haywood Nelson Talks Career and What’s Happening TV Show
